title: Rolla Koopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Rollin'**: Roll into a player at night, attacking them instantly in the middle of the night.
- **Acrobatic**: Astrally jump over a player, roleblocking them if they visit a Koopa.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Can use both abilities in one night thrice per game.

desc:
Post 4309
*Magenta-shelled Koopa Troopas with roller skates that skate along the ground and jump gaps between platforms.*
